  • Method Details

    • crawl

      public void crawl(File bundle)
      Crawl a PDS4 bundle file. The bundle will be registered first, then the method will proceed to crawling the collection file it points to.
      Overrides:
      crawl in class CollectionCrawler
      Parameters:
